poem:
**The Modern Wrist**

Upon this wrist, the vast  
pulses of a world distilled—  
a glowing face, whispers  
of satellites, guiding  
in wildness, in depth.  
Here, technology strides  
with nature, ticking  
bold and boundless—  
yet, at what cost, the  
weight of such wonder  
upon a simple wrist.
